headline: Is Essex Property Trust (ESS) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Essex Property Trust is attractively priced right now, you are not alone. This article is aimed at helping you judge what you are paying for each dollar of its real estate cash flows. The stock closed at US$255.33, with returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 0.5% over 30 days, a 0.6% decline year to date and an 11.2% decline over 1 year, set against gains of 25.9% over 3 years and 17.1% over 5 years. Recent attention on Essex Property Trust has been shaped by ongoing...
